import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Offcanvas,Container, Row, Col, Image, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; const Cloth = () => { const [mainPic, setMainPic] = useState( 'https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/j/j/jjk-32937_1_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds' ); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const products = [ { id: 1, title: "BLUE RAW SILK UNSTITCHED 3PC", price: "PKR 5,265.00", originalPrice: "PKR 10,530.00", discount: "50% OFF", imageUrl: "https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/4/24-035_1_.jpg?optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds&height=640&width=640&canvas=640:640&dpr=2", // Replace with actual image paths }, { id: 2, title: "MULTICOLOR LINEN PRINTED UNSTITCHED 3PC", price: "PKR 4,712.00", originalPrice: "PKR 5,890.00", discount: "20% OFF", imageUrl: "https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/3/23-430_1_.jpg?optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds&height=640&width=640&canvas=640:640&dpr=2", }, { id: 3, title: "BROWN LAWN UNSTITCHED 3PC", price: "PKR 3,380.00", imageUrl: "https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/3/23-602_1_.jpg?optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds&height=640&width=640&canvas=640:640&dpr=2", }, { id: 4, title: "MULTICOLOR LAWN UNSTITCHED 3PC", price: "PKR 3,380.00", imageUrl: "https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/j/s/jst-24-1649_1_.jpg?optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds&height=640&width=640&canvas=640:640&dpr=2", }, ]; const sliderSettings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 4, slidesToScroll: 3, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 1024, settings: { slidesToShow: 3, }, }, { breakpoint: 768, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, }, }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, }, }, ], }; return ( {/* Left Section */}
setMainPic('https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/j/j/jjk-32937_1_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds')} src="https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/j/j/jjk-32937_1_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds" style={{ width: '27%', height: '90%', cursor: 'pointer' }} fluid /> setMainPic('https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/4/24-1799_2_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds')} src="https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/4/24-1799_2_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds" style={{ width: '27%', height: '90%', cursor: 'pointer' }} fluid /> setMainPic('https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/4/24-1799_3_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds')} src="https://www.junaidjamshed.com/media/catalog/product/2/4/24-1799_3_.jpg?width=436&height=560&canvas=436,560&optimize=medium&bg-color=255,255,255&fit=bounds" style={{ width: '27%', height: '90%', cursor: 'pointer' }} fluid />
